Row.Text: You will face me on the battlefield!
You have insulted us for the last time. This means war!
You are a scourge to the Nenetses which we will no longer tolerate!
Oooh, I knew you were nothing but trouble!
Ridiculous! I have not lost!
Very well...
I have heard whispers of you through the forests. Finally, do I get to meet you. I am Vauli Piettomin, leader of the mighty Samoyedic Empire
The Samoyedic people greet you, Stranger! I am Vauli Piettomin!
Greetings, Stranger! I am Vauli Piettomin, mighty leader of the Samoyedic People! Let us feast to celebrate this grand occasion!
Ah, welcome back. The Samoyedic people is always happy to entertain friends.
We of the Samoyedic Empire great you.
Do you wish to attack the mighty Samoyedics? Your armies seems to indicate this. Pull them back before it's too late.
Are you like all the others? Respect the rights of the Samoyedics before this leads to war!
Even the mighty will stumble. Might I ask a good friend for help?
You will face me on the battlefield!
You have insulted us for the last time. This means war!
You are a scourge to the Nenetses which we will no longer tolerate!
Oooh, I knew you were nothing but trouble!
Ridiculous! I have not lost!
Very well...
I have heard whispers of you through the forests. Finally, do I get to meet you. I am Vauli Piettomin, leader of the mighty Samoyedic Empire
The Samoyedic people greet you, Stranger! I am Vauli Piettomin!
Greetings, Stranger! I am Vauli Piettomin, mighty leader of the Samoyedic People! Let us feast to celebrate this grand occasion!
Ah, welcome back. The Samoyedic people is always happy to entertain friends.
We of the Samoyedic Empire great you.
Do you wish to attack the mighty Samoyedics? Your armies seems to indicate this. Pull them back before it's too late.
Are you like all the others? Respect the rights of the Samoyedics before this leads to war!
Even the mighty will stumble. Might I ask a good friend for help?
Rendez-vous sur le champs de bataille!
Vous nous avez suffisamment insultés, cela signifie la guerre!
Vous êtes une plaie pour les Nenetses, et cela ne peut plus être toléré!
Je savais bien que vous ne seriez qu'une source de problèmes pour nous!
C'est ridicule, je n'ai pas perdu!
Trés bien...
Des caravannes de marchands m'ont dit bien des choses à votre sujet. Je vous rencontre enfin. Je suis Vauli Piettomin, Chef de l'empire samoyède!
Les samoyèdes vous saluent étranger! Je suis Vauli Piettomin!
Salutation étranger! Je suis Vauli Piettomin, grand chef de l'Empire samoyède! Célèbrons cette rencontre!
Ah, encore vous? Les Samoyèdes sont toujours ravis de parler à des amis.
L'empire samoyède vous salue.
Vous avez l'intention de nous attaquer? C'est ce que semblent indiquer les récents mouvements de troupes à nos frontières. Retirez-les avant qu'il ne soit trop tard.
Votre expansion telle la gangraine nous inquiète! Modérez votre expansion ou vous allez le regretter!
Les temps sont durs. Puis-je solliciter l'aide d'un bon ami?
